bug.author: DickyQi
bug.summary: Compile at Mac OSX with vulkansdk-macos-1.2.135.0
bug.description: compile with vulkansdk-macos-1.2.135.0, runtime error such as program_source:176:1972: error: cannot reserve 'sampler' resource location at index 0 program_source:176:1720: error: cannot reserve 'texture' resource location at index 1 program_source:185:148: error: cannot reserve 'buffer' resource location at index 0 [mvk-error] VK_ERROR_INVALID_SHADER_NV: Compute shader function could not be compiled into pipeline. See previous logged error. vkCreateComputePipelines failed -1000012000

comments.comment:
please use 20200413 tag <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Tencent/ncnn/tree/20200413>https://github.com/Tencent/ncnn/tree/20200413</denchmark-link>
It shall be a compatibility issue in shader code in master branch
